5e1fcae4ec0c3cb5fe9e7cbe0d1647aa (13:18): fxd0h: it's possible that applications have to advertise this capability, and the ones that are greyed out may not be regestering a creator type.
5e1fcae4ec0c3cb5fe9e7cbe0d1647aa (13:18): I'm not sure if Apple requires apps to register creator values. It wouldn't surprise me if it's optional.
